<p><span>All of the questions you WEREN’T afraid to ask - well, *most* of them anyway - are all in one place. Enjoy the <a href="http://bit.ly/1cHMpHa"><strong>Asteroid Redirect Mission FAQ</strong></a>.<span class="Apple-converted-space">*</span></span><br/><br/><span>If you’re wondering about anything else that wasn’t answered by this and today’s Squadcast video, leave us a comment and perhaps you’ll see your answer in a future edition.</span></p>

will the magic boulder come back?

oh yeah, and will asteroids crash on other planets just like they do on Kerbin too?

Edited March 15, 2014 by Clockwork13
If it doesn't, then you can just put your own into orbit around Ike.

If it doesn't, then you can just put your own into orbit around Ike.

True, but what other asteroids besides the boulder are radioactive?
will the new tracking station functions also be used for detecting and studying other planetary bodies aka Observatory..or lay the groundwork for that aspect of gameplay?

Having all questions in one place will make it more likely to be noticed I think, so please direct your questions here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/265-Kerbal-Space-Program-Asteroid-Redirect-Mission-The-FAQ

Thread locked
